original_title: The Ultimate Collection Starring Johnny Carson - The Best of the 60s and 70s
overview: From those early days of black and white with Ed Ames' memorable Tomahawk toss, to Tiny Tim's Technicolor wedding, to Letterman and Leno's stand-up debuts; the first decade of The Tonight Show was filled with once-in-a-lifetime classic TV moments. This volume includes: Pearl Baily, Buddy Hackett, Steve Martin, George Carlin, Flip Wilson, Don Rickles, Dolly Parton and more!
title: The Ultimate Collection Starring Johnny Carson - The Best of the 60s and 70s
